Articles.Content:
Eeloo, to the best of my knowledge, does not currently have any ground scatter. While ground scatter is currently only aesthetic, I think it would be nice to have them on all the bodies that you can land on. As far as I know, Eeloo is the only one without any ground scatter. In this thread, I'd like to discuss the possibilities for Eeloo's ground scatter.

My suggestion? I don't have a specific suggestion. I'd say, for now, to just use the generic rock and make it a light shade of blue (like this, maybe less saturated and a little... dirtied). This could maybe be a placeholder until the geysers are added or could be roughed up a little so they look like debris form the geysers. I'd like to hear what you guys think, so... What do the rest of the community think?
I think all planets/moons should have ground scatter. BTW i like your suggestion of color

I suggest snowmen Ã¢ËœÆ’!

No, seriously. I think semi-transparent ice crystals could work. Or ice spikes like they are suspected to exist on Europa.

Edited March 1, 2014 by Crush
